column1: T4: Here's the thing, in too much of the country #SDOH service providers are still outside of the mainstream, and disconnected from healthcare provider/delivery networks. Work is actively underway to change that, but won't be effective for the current #COVID19 crisis. #HITsm

T2: There has not (yet) been an "official" corporate response to #Covid19. That said, we are a relatively small company with a VERY liberal remote work policy. I'm one of only 5-6 people physically in my 50+ person office today. #HITsm
